overall.description: Convert the input to a masked array of the given data-type.

a.description: Input data, in any form that can be converted to a masked array. This includes lists, lists of tuples, tuples, tuples of tuples, tuples of lists, ndarrays and masked arrays.

dtype.description: By default, the data-type is inferred from the input data.

order.description: Whether to use row-major (‘C’) or column-major (‘FORTRAN’) memory representation.  Default is ‘C’.
